segments.text: What kind of qualities should a secretary have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First , she needs to be hard-working . Second , she has to be able to do a lot ot things on her own initiative .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am diligent and hard-working . Besides , I am good at both English and Italian .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . We will give you a chance to have an interview in our company .
segments.speaker: S2
